# 赛斯书：时空之外

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shikong-zhiwai
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shikong-zhiwai
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shikong-zhiwai
shikong-zhiwai <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shikong-zhiwai
shikong-zhiwai <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
